meanings.sent1: After the test, the teacher decided to resubject the students to another round of questions.

meanings.sent3: The students groaned when they heard they would be resubjecting themselves to more math problems.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was resubjecting herself to the same nightmare every night.

meanings.sent1: The government decided to resubject the citizens to stricter regulations for safety.
